childAltar.hintText: 3 Spiritual Stones found in Hyrule...^$0Link's Pocket...^$1Jabu-Jabu's Belly...^$2Deku Tree...^$oYe who may become a Hero...&The path to the future is open...

adultAltar.hintText: An awakening voice from the Sacred&Realm will call those destined to be&Sages, who dwell in the five temples.^$8Water Temple...^$3Fire Temple...^$4Shadow Temple...^$5Forest Temple...^$6Dodongo's Cavern...^$7Spirit Temple...^$lThe awakened ones will await&for the Hero to find %gGreg%w.^$bAnd the %revil one%w's key will be&provided by Zelda once %r5&Spiritual Stones and Medallions%w&are retrieved.^$kTogether with the Hero of Time,&the awakened ones will return&the light of peace to the world...

ganonText: You'll never deflect my bolts of&energy with your sword, then shoot&me with those Light Arrows you&happen to have.
ganonHintText: Ha ha ha... You'll never beat me&by reflecting my lightning bolts&and unleashing the arrows from&%rHyrule Castle%w!^And even if you do, you'll never&find the legendary blade hidden in&%rSacred Forest Meadow%w!
sheikText: I overheard Ganondorf say that he&misplaced the %yLight Arrows%w in&%rHyrule Castle%w.^He also stole %gthe Master Sword%w&and hid it in %rSacred Forest&Meadow%w.
dampeText: Whoever reads this, please enter&%rDeath Mountain Trail%w. I will&let you have my stretching,&shrinking keepsake.^I'm waiting for you.&--Dampé
gregText: By the way, if you're interested,&I saw the shiniest %gGreen Rupee%w&somewhere in%g Forest Temple%w.^It's said to have %rmysterious&powers%w...^But then, it could just be another&regular rupee.&Oh well.

Colossus Gossip Stone.hint: They say that %rBottom of the&Well%w hoards %gDeku Stick&Capacity%w.
Colossus Gossip Stone.location: Bottom of the Well Back Left Bombable Chest

DMC Gossip Stone.hint: They say that %rdeep in the forest&shadows guard a chest containing&%gGreg%w.

DMC Upper Grotto Gossip Stone.hint: They say that %rFire Temple%w&hoards %ga Piece of Heart%w.
DMC Upper Grotto Gossip Stone.location: Fire Temple Big Lava Room Lower Open Door Chest

DMT Gossip Stone.hint: They say that %rthe Light&Arrows%w can be found at&%gHyrule Castle%w.

DMT Storms Grotto Gossip Stone.hint: They say that %rInside Ganon's&Castle%w hoards %ga Blue&Rupee%w.

Dodongo's Cavern Gossip Stone.hint: They say that %rShadow Temple%w&hoards %gthe Stone of Agony%w.
Dodongo's Cavern Gossip Stone.location: Shadow Temple Early Silver Rupee Chest

Fairy Gossip Stone.hint: They say she is lying with the red&letters!

GY Gossip Stone.hint: They say Ganondorf's bolts can be&reflected with glass or steel.

HC Malon Gossip Stone.hint: They say that %rthe Ocarina of&Time teaches %gthe Song of&Storms%w.

HC Rock Wall Gossip Stone.hint: They say that plundering %rWater&Temple%w is %pa foolish choice%w.

HC Storms Grotto Gossip Stone.hint: They say that %rthe Song of&Time%w can be found at %gDesert&Colossus%w.

HF Cow Grotto Gossip Stone.hint: They say you wanted to see me&%pMr. Kenix%w?

HF Near Market Gossip Stone.hint: They say that %rthe Song of Time&in the Gerudo Training Grounds&leads to %ga Piece of Heart%w.

Jabu Gossip Stone.hint: They say that %rthe Kakariko&Potion Shop offers %ga Piece of&Heart%w.

KF Gossip Stone.hint: They say that %ra red ghost&guards %ga Big Poe Bottle%w.

LH Southwest Gossip Stone.hint: They say that %ran Ocarina%w can&be found at %gDeath Mountain&Crater%w.
